about.title: About
content: My name is Harry Seymour, I am a software developer based in the south of England. This is a temporary portfolio site so show off some of the projects that I have worked on.

I have previous experience with .net development, SQL databasemanagement, computer vision and machine learning applications inPython, C and C++, as well as experience with embedded systems inlow level languages. Some of my work has also involved some basicelectronics.
My background is in cognitive and developmental neuropsychology. My master's degree included modules in advanced statistics and introduced me to data processing and analysis using Python and MATLAB.
